0132B4FD.Phase53Description:
The Great Axe of Raekor has been stolen from the Oxen Tribe.

The forgemaster, Gerti, suspects agents of the Triune are to blame. She's asked me to seek them out at the southern tip of the Scarred Coast and recover the storied weapon.

0871A46B.Toast: Recover the ancestral weapon of the Oxen Tribe.

1315987A.Phase23Description:
Gerti needs materials to reforge the Great Axe.

First, I must find an Oppressor demon in the Hapless Frontier and take one of its horns.

3181449A.Phase32Description:
Gerti needs materials to reforge the Great Axe.

With the demon horn fouling my pack, I now need a rare ore from the Infested Delve of the Kotama Grasslands.

5CD6EA0D.Phase8Description: The Great Axe is broken. Gerti will need to see the weapon and decide what to do next.

6A9510E0.Callback55Header: Retrieve the Great Axe of Raekor

9F90DE2D.Callback7Header: Return the broken Great Axe to Gerti in Ked Bardu

A5CF923D.Callback25Header: Return the materials to Gerti in Ked Bardu

A5EFB09D.Phase26Description: I have the materials Gerti requested. Time to get back to Ked Bardu.
